GSD.description:
fs: fix UAF/GPF bug in nilfs_mdt_destroy

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.73 by commit 64b79e632869ad3ef6c098a4731d559381da1115. For more details please see the references link.
